title: Biryani
summary: Biryani (/bɪrˈjɑːni/) is a mixed rice dish originating among the Muslims of the Indian subcontinent.[1][2][3] It is made with spices, rice, and meat usually that of beef, chicken, goat, lamb, prawn, fish, and sometimes, in addition, eggs or vegetables such as potatoes in certain regional varieties.[4]
